system.effect: Permenant +1 to Morale, and +5 to Intimidate Tests on the ship made during Extended Actions. +25 Achievement Points towards an objective involving capturing, storing, or transporting prisoners.

description.value: Permenant +1 to Morale, and +5 to Intimidate Tests on the ship made during Extended Actions. +25 Achievement Points towards an objective involving capturing, storing, or transporting prisoners.
